definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Wheatgrass helps with skin problems such as eczema or psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 麥草有助於改善皮膚問題，例如溼疹或牛皮癬。

sentences.english: So, patients with psoriasis can eat raw soya-bean milk?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，牛皮癬患者可以生食豆漿嗎？

sentences.english: Suffer from a skin condition like eczema or psoriasis?
sentences.chinese: 患有類似溼疹或牛皮癬嗎？

sentences.english: There are a lot of is born soya-bean milk to patients with psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 生豆漿中有很多是不利於牛皮癬患者的。

sentences.english: Not just this, green tea is also proven to be highly effective in curing eczema and psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 而且，實踐證明綠茶對溼疹和牛皮癬都有顯著療效。

sentences.english: This should also be considered for all patients with ankylosing spondylitis and psoriatic arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 這同樣適用於強直性脊柱炎和牛皮癬關節炎的患者。

sentences.english: Obesity as Young Adult May Boost Psoriatic Arthritis Risk.
sentences.chinese: 年輕時肥胖會增加罹患牛皮癬關節炎的比率。

sentences.english: This is the psoriasis and other diseases, erythema scaling differential points.
sentences.chinese: 這是牛皮癬和其他紅斑鱗屑疾病鑑別的要點。

sentences.english: Anhui armed police corps hospital is how to treat psoriasis?
sentences.chinese: 安徽武警總隊醫院是如何治療牛皮癬的？
